create.title: Death Muffin
create.description:
The Death Muffin: Elevate Beyond Orbit

Experience the pinnacle of artisanal cosmic baking. The Death Muffin isn't just a treat; it’s a high-performance botanical experience designed for the seasoned connoisseur. Crafted for those who demand the absolute maximum from their space-age snacks, this premium muffin delivers a profile of potency and purity that is unrivaled in the current market.
 

 

Product Highlights

  • Maximum Potency: Engineered with a specialized CBD/THC concentrate, reaching a staggering 60%+ total cannabinoid density.

  • Premium Infusion: We use proprietary extraction methods to ensure a clean, fast-acting, and long-lasting effect without the bitter aftertaste of lower-grade distillates.

  • Gourmet Foundation: Beneath the power lies a rich, dark chocolate velvet muffin base, providing a decadent flavor profile that complements its intense internal chemistry.

  • Elite Status: The signature black box signifies our highest tier of potency—reserved strictly for those who prioritize strength above all else.

 

⚠️ Safety Disclaimer & Usage Guidelines

 

EXTREME POTENCY: PLEASE READ BEFORE CONSUMING.

The Death Muffin is significantly more powerful than standard market edibles. Due to the high concentration ($>60\%$), we strictly advise the following:

 

  • Start Micro: Do not consume a whole muffin in one sitting unless you have a very high documented tolerance. We recommend starting with 1/8th or less and waiting at least 120 minutes to gauge the effects.

  • Environment Matters: Ensure you are in a safe, comfortable, and controlled environment. Do not operate heavy machinery, drive, or perform tasks requiring intense focus after consumption.

  • Storage: Keep in a cool, dry place and strictly out of reach of children and pets. The appearance resembles a standard baked good; ensure it remains in its labeled "Death Muffin" packaging.

  • Health Consultation: If you have underlying medical conditions, are pregnant, or are taking prescription medications, consult a healthcare professional before use.

create.title: Premium Outdoor
create.description:
Harnessing the power of nature, our Premium Outdoor Cannabis is cultivated under natural sunlight in pristine, nutrient-rich soil. Grown with care in open fields, this cannabis captures the true essence of the earth, delivering robust flavor profiles and natural, well-rounded effects.

 

Our outdoor-grown buds develop slowly with natural air circulation and sunlight, resulting in dense, aromatic flowers with vibrant colors and a smooth, rich smoke. Perfect for those who appreciate authentic, eco-friendly cultivation methods, our Premium Outdoor Cannabis is harvested at peak maturity to ensure quality, potency, and purity.

 

Highlights:

  • Naturally sun-grown in open, sustainable environments

  • Full-bodied flavors with complex terpene profiles

  • Lab-tested for safety, quality, and cannabinoid content

  • Ideal for users seeking natural, earthy cannabis experiences

 

Enjoy the authentic taste of nature with our Premium Outdoor Cannabis — crafted by the sun, perfected by nature.

create.title: Mango Peach Watermelon
create.description:
The Elf Bar EW18000 is a next-generation disposable vape pod designed for long-lasting performance and convenience. With an impressive capacity of up to 18,000 puffs and a generous 17 mL of pre-filled e-liquid, it ensures extended use without the need for frequent replacements. Featuring 50 mg salt nicotine for a strong, satisfying hit, the device utilizes advanced mesh coil technology to deliver smoother draws and enhanced flavor with every puff.

Its magnetic attachment system allows quick and easy connection to a rechargeable battery or power bank, while an upgraded air-sensor prevents misfires and ensures consistent performance. Available in a wide range of fruity and icy flavors such as Cotton Candy Ice, California Cherry, and Mango Peach Watermelon, the Elf Bar EW18000 combines power, flavor, and portability, making it an ideal choice for vapers who want both convenience and quality.

create.title: Blue Storm
create.description: The MOTI ONE 4000 Kit is a sleek and compact refillable pod vape designed for users who value convenience, style, and performance. Featuring a durable all-metal body and stepless airflow control, it offers a customizable mouth-to-lung vaping experience in a pocket-friendly form. The 2 mL refillable pod comes equipped with a high-quality mesh or ceramic coil, delivering smooth, consistent flavor and vapor. Powered by a built-in 600 mAh battery, the device supports up to 4000 puffs per charge and is activated by a simple draw—no buttons required. With a wide variety of vibrant color options and popular nicotine salt flavors, the MOTI ONE 4000 strikes the perfect balance between elegance, portability, and user-friendly functionality.

create.title: Space Muffin
create.description:

Each bite delivers rich flavour and a soft, fluffy texture that takes your taste buds on a cosmic journey — calm, comforting, and absolutely satisfying.

create.title: Blue Razz
create.description:
EW9000 allows for independent use whenever you are pleasing. Slim, sleek and portable – experience vaping freedom with the joy of ease.

 

The interchangeable pods and charging devices open up more possibilities to create over 56 unique patterns. It takes just a click to find the right vibe. 

 

The in-built advanced mesh coil with ultra-fine atomization unlocks the full taste potential of your e-liquid, ensuring a richer and more flavorful vaping experience. Power up your next adventure without a hitch.

 

The charging device intuitively indicates the battery level in green, blue, and red, keeping you informed at all times. Bring you a better vaping experience with an upgraded air-sensor structure. This prevents unexpected activations or delayed shutdowns. With EW9000, it’s always a smooth and enjoyable vaping experience.

create.title: Cherry Lemon Peach
create.description:
The Elf Bar EW18000 is a next-generation disposable vape pod designed for long-lasting performance and convenience. With an impressive capacity of up to 18,000 puffs and a generous 17 mL of pre-filled e-liquid, it ensures extended use without the need for frequent replacements. Featuring 50 mg salt nicotine for a strong, satisfying hit, the device utilizes advanced mesh coil technology to deliver smoother draws and enhanced flavor with every puff.

Its magnetic attachment system allows quick and easy connection to a rechargeable battery or power bank, while an upgraded air-sensor prevents misfires and ensures consistent performance. Available in a wide range of fruity and icy flavors such as Cotton Candy Ice, California Cherry, and Mango Peach Watermelon, the Elf Bar EW18000 combines power, flavor, and portability, making it an ideal choice for vapers who want both convenience and quality.

create.title: Rainbow Fizz
create.description: The MOTI ONE 4000 Kit is a sleek and compact refillable pod vape designed for users who value convenience, style, and performance. The 2 mL refillable pod comes equipped with a high-quality mesh or ceramic coil, delivering smooth, consistent flavor and vapor. Powered by a built-in 600 mAh battery, the device supports up to 4000 puffs per charge and is activated by a simple draw—no buttons required. With a wide variety of vibrant color options and popular nicotine salt flavors, the MOTI ONE 4000 strikes the perfect balance between elegance, portability, and user-friendly functionality.

The NASTY POD PX10 is a Nicotine Salt Disposable Pod Device designed to deliver maximum flavour performance of up to 5,000 puffs.

It features a rechargeable device that works with replaceable pre-filled pod cartridges, which means long-term savings that are friendlier to your wallet!

create.title: Cushman Strawberry
create.description:
The NASTY BAR DR20Ki is a big puff rechargeable Nicotine Salt Disposable Device that delivers up to 20,000 puffs of pure flavour satisfaction.

What makes this device stand out compared to others is that it delivers consistent flavour and nicotine satisfaction from beginning to end, which is unique compared to other big-puff devices in the market.

The Dynamic Control feature allows you to switch modes based on your needs and preferences.

create.title: Tropical Cherry
create.description:
The NASTY BAR D9Ki is a rechargeable Nicotine Salt Disposable Device featuring our latest e-liquid formulation that delivers smooth, bold flavour and satisfaction until the very last drop.

 

It is a revamped version of our global best-seller DX8.5i device, with enhanced performance and increased liquid capacity to deliver up to 9,000 puffs of consistent flavour and satisfaction.

create.title: Elfbar Battery
create.description: The ELFBAR EW9000 is the world’s first closed‑pod disposable vape to integrate a rechargeable battery directly into the pod, delivering up to 9 000 puffs from a single 16 mL refill. Its magnetic “pod + power bank” system lets you vape on‑the‑go using just the pod’s 200 mAh cell, or dock it onto the 820 mAh bank for extended sessions without interruption

create.title: Dragon Strawnana
create.description:
EW9000 allows for independent use whenever you are pleasing. Slim, sleek and portable – experience vaping freedom with the joy of ease.

 

The interchangeable pods and charging devices open up more possibilities to create over 56 unique patterns. It takes just a click to find the right vibe. 

 

The in-built advanced mesh coil with ultra-fine atomization unlocks the full taste potential of your e-liquid, ensuring a richer and more flavorful vaping experience. Power up your next adventure without a hitch.

 

The charging device intuitively indicates the battery level in green, blue, and red, keeping you informed at all times. Bring you a better vaping experience with an upgraded air-sensor structure. This prevents unexpected activations or delayed shutdowns. With EW9000, it’s always a smooth and enjoyable vaping experience.
